text: Alexei Sergeevich Travkin () (born Moscow, 2 August 1977) is a former Russian rugby union player who played as a prop. He played for VVA-Podmoskovye Monino, known as VVA Saracens until 2016. He had 56 caps for Russia, from 2001 to 2011, scoring 1 try, 5 points on aggregate. He was called for the 2011 Rugby World Cup, playing in two games. He left the national team after the competition.Alexei Travkin International Statistics ==References== ==External links== *Alexei Travkin International Statistics Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Russian rugby union players Category:Russia international rugby union players Category:VVA Saracens players Category:Rugby union props Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
